trans-unit.source: Metallic Sliver

trans-unit.source: When the clever counterfeit was accepted by the hive, Volrath's influence upon the slivers grew even stronger.
trans-unit.target: When the clever counterfeit was accepted by the hive, Volrath's influence upon the slivers grew even stronger.

trans-unit.source: Virulent Sliver
trans-unit.target: Virulent Sliver

trans-unit.resname: H09·2 | Virulent Sliver | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: All Sliver creatures have poisonous 1. (Whenever a Sliver deals combat damage to a player, that player gets a poison counter. A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)
trans-unit.target: All Sliver creatures have poisonous 1. (Whenever a Sliver deals combat damage to a player, that player gets a poison counter. A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)

trans-unit.source: Frenzy Sliver

trans-unit.target: All Sliver creatures have frenzy 1. (Whenever a Sliver attacks and isn't blocked, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn.)

trans-unit.source: The Arturan conjurers took the strange, alien fossil and patterned their own twisted creations in its image.

trans-unit.source: All Sliver creatures have haste.

trans-unit.source: Gerrard looked all around for the source of the mysterious pulse, and at that moment the slivers boiled forth from the crevasses.
trans-unit.target: Gerrard looked all around for the source of the mysterious pulse, and at that moment the slivers boiled forth from the crevasses.

trans-unit.target: All Slivers have "{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."

trans-unit.source: "The land is weary. Even Skyshroud is depleted. We must find another source of mana—one that is growing despite our withering world."\n—Freyalise
trans-unit.target: "The land is weary. Even Skyshroud is depleted. We must find another source of mana—one that is growing despite our withering world."\n—Freyalise

trans-unit.source: The air was filled with the cracks and snaps of flesh hardening as the new sliver joined the battle.

trans-unit.source: The directors of the Riptide Project wanted instant results on the sliver experiments. They got their wish.

trans-unit.source: Bred as living shields, these slivers have proven unruly—they know they cannot be caught.

trans-unit.target: All Slivers have "Pay 2 life: Return this permanent to its owner's hand."

trans-unit.source: Mogglings have been known to play ball with hibernating slivers, completely unaware of their true nature.

trans-unit.source: The first sliver burst against the cave wall, and others piled in behind to deepen the new tunnel.

trans-unit.target: Whenever a Sliver becomes blocked, that Sliver gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it.

trans-unit.source: "Slivers are evil and slivers are sly; And if you get eaten, then no one will cry."\n—Mogg children's rhyme

trans-unit.source: "We are kinfolk," explained Karn to the sliver queen. "Just as you need your progeny to complete you, so do I need the pieces of the Legacy to make me whole."
